LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.label: 극도의
LanguageData.Scarification_Extreme.description: Every person ought to bear the ritual scars - all over.
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.label: 심각함
LanguageData.Scarification_Heavy.description: Every person ought to bear the ritual scars - many of them.
LanguageData.Scarification_Horrible.label: 끔찍함
LanguageData.Scarification_Horrible.description: Scarifying people for ideoligious reasons is horrible.
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.label: 약간
LanguageData.Scarification_Minor.description: Every person ought to bear a ritual scar.
